content: Mountain fires are thought of causing little harm with the only damage being the burning of trees and shrubs, but actually there's a hell of a 'hidden character'.
translations: ita:Si pensa che gli incendi di montagna causino pochi danni, avendo come unico danno l'incendio di alberi e arbusti, mentre
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by fcbond (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
